name: The Abyss of Dungeon
description:
Description

The Abyss of Dungeon is is a randomly generated roguelike game. 

After death, the character's life increases.

Instructions

Move - WASD or Arrows

Talk with the trader - Left Mouse Button

Killing - WASD or Arrows

Key features:

* Randomly generated dungeons, items enemies, you never play the same game twice.

* Two enemy types each with the ability to become "special" making them extra deadly but they also drop better loot.

* Different music.
